alert.note: Alert for Big Island South; Kohala; Kona (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 17 at 3:33AM HST until February 17 at 12:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... .The current west-northwest swell continues to generate elevated surf along most north and west facing shores this morning. This swell will gradually subside later today. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON HST TODAY... * WHAT...Surf of 6 to 8 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of the Big Island. * WHEN...Through this morning. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
